emails.subject: Fwd: Application for Internship at ISRO - NRSC
emails.body_text:
I hope this message finds you well. My name is Richard Samuel D, a
third-year B.E student specializing in Computer Science and Engineering
with specialisation in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at PSG
College of Technology, Coimbatore.

I am writing to express my keen interest in the internship opportunity
listed on the NRSC website. My academic background and projects, including
work on image processing, predictive analytics, and machine learning
applications, align well with the scope of the internship.

I am eager to contribute my skills in AI, Machine Learning and Software
Development while gaining practical exposure to cutting-edge technologies
and research at ISRO. I would be grateful for the opportunity to learn from
esteemed experts in this field and contribute to ongoing projects at NRSC.

I have attached my CV, Letter of Recommendation, Grade 10,12 mark sheets
and my College Gradesheets from the past 3 semesters of my course for your
consideration. I would be delighted to discuss how I can contribute to
NRSC’s ongoing initiatives. Thank you for considering my application. I
look forward to the possibility of contributing to your esteemed
organization.

*Sincerely,*
Richard Samuel D
B.E (CSE - AI & ML)
PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore
richybe2022@gmail.com
+91 9384559645
emails.body_html:
I hope this message finds you well. My name is Richard Samuel D, a third-year B.E student specializing in Computer Science and Engineering with specialisation in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore.

I am writing to express my keen interest in the internship opportunity listed on the NRSC website. My academic background and projects, including work on image processing, predictive analytics, and machine learning applications, align well with the scope of the internship.

I am eager to contribute my skills in AI, Machine Learning and Software Development while gaining practical exposure to cutting-edge technologies and research at ISRO. I would be grateful for the opportunity to learn from esteemed experts in this field and contribute to ongoing projects at NRSC.

I have attached my CV, Letter of Recommendation, Grade 10,12 mark sheets and my College Gradesheets from the past 3 semesters of my course for your consideration. I would be delighted to discuss how I can contribute to NRSC’s ongoing initiatives. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of contributing to your esteemed organization.

Sincerely,
Richard Samuel D
B.E (CSE - AI & ML)
PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore
richybe2022@gmail.com
+91 9384559645
